name: Minecarter
description:
If name shows up as numbers on leaderboard REFRESH and type your name again!

Gameplay, Art and Sound done by HmanHere

Created for Mini Jam 109

Theme: Depths

Limitation: Health is a tool

Objective:

Jump from minecart to minecart avoiding rocks that will push you to your demise. Watch out though! The minecarts will get faster and faster. Pick up hearts to slow your carts down. See how far you can get!

Tip:

Although going faster gets you to greater distances in less time, you will get further overall if you pick up as many hearts and slowly increase your speed instead of letting it run.

Feel free to msg me on discord about the game or anything

HmanHere#2861

Thank you!
